news_header: The fourth-quarter 2024 earnings season is underway, with 78 S&P 500 companies reporting a 17.4% year-over-year earnings increase. Key companies like Cardinal Health, Logitech, ServiceNow, Corning, and Automatic Data Processing are set to report soon, with positive earnings expectations.
news_text: As the fourth-quarter 2024 earnings season begins, results from 78 S&P 500 companies show a 17.4% increase in earnings year-over-year, with 83.3% surpassing EPS estimates. Major companies like Cardinal Health, Logitech, ServiceNow, Corning, and Automatic Data Processing are expected to report positive earnings soon. Each of these companies has a favorable Zacks Rank and Earnings ESP, indicating potential for stock price appreciation following their earnings releases.
